title: Carnival CEO Says Company is 'Recession Resilient'
itunes:title: Carnival CEO Says Company is 'Recession Resilient'
description:
Arnold Donald, CEO at Carnival Corp, discusses the state of the cruise industry amid inflation concerns and talks about his transition to Vice Chair of the company. Bloomberg Markets Senior Editor Mike Regan talks about his Businessweek Magazine story End of Stock Market Growth Run Makes Everyone a Bargain Hunter. And we Drive to the Close with Mark Travis, President and CEO at Intrepid Capital. Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
